long_description: Need a compact, lightweight daypack to take traveling? You'll have room for essentials without feeling weighed down when you carry the Deuter Nomi Daypack. Weighs only 1 lb. 2 oz. and offers 16 liters of capacity. 2 contoured layers of knobby foam with AirMesh lining and minimal back contact provide maximum airflow. Flexible aluminum stays within the foam can be bent to fit your back exactly. Women-specific shoulder straps have mesh for comfort; waist belt can be removed. External zippered pocket keeps a phone or wallet handy; stretch-mesh side pockets hold water bottles, snacks and more. Deuter Nomi Daypack has a top carry loop for easy grab and go.
short_description: Need a compact, lightweight daypack to take traveling? You'll have room for essentials without feeling weighed down when you carry the Deuter Nomi Daypack.
